name: spo-get-customfields-lists
title: Get custom fields within lists and libraries within a site
shortDescription: Get custom Fields within lists and libraries within a site.
longDescription: The script will generate a csv report listing the field title and internal name for lists and libraries excluding out of the box lists or fields

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
